channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ University of Basel on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Loss Landscape Characterization of Neural Networks without Over-Parametrization
item.description: Deep learning optimization is revolutionized by a new function class, enabling convergence guarantees without over-parameterization and accommodating saddle points.

item.title: Theoretical Characterisation of the Gauss Newton Conditioning in Neural Networks
item.description: New theoretical bounds reveal how neural network architecture impacts the Gauss-Newton matrix’s conditioning, paving the way for improved optimization.
